darkhistory.spec.transferfunclist¶

Functions and classes for processing lists of transfer functions.

Classes

TransferFuncInterp(tflistarrs[, rs_nodes, …]) Interpolation function over list of TransferFuncList objects.
TransferFuncInterps(tfInterps, xe_arr) Interpolation function over list of TransferFuncList objects.
TransferFuncList(tflist) List of transfer functions.
TransferFuncListArray(tflist_arr, x_arr) Array of TransferFuncList for array of xH, xHe values.
